welcome.getInContact: You're still welcome to contact me at
projects.headline: Projects
aboutMe.headline: Mehr von mir
aboutMe.intro: Besides the usual "I like tech and am very ambitioned", I enjoy a few more things outside of the buble. Instead of writing long paragraphs of text, please check out the following:
blog.headline: Blog
blog.intro: A blog about things I want to write about. Probably food, garden, thoughts and the internet.
thingsILike.headline: Things I like
thingsILike.intro: A list of things I like: people, products and various other things.
inData.headline: In Data: Joshua
inData.intro: CV, "skills", facts. Important to some, uninteresting to others.
now.headline: What now?
now.intro: For everyone asking 'What are you up to now?'
now.dogText: I have a dog now. She's a mixed breed from a dog shelter in Greece. Her name's 'Alaia' and she wasa born in Octobre 2021. I got her this May and it's been a hell of a time. Exciting, joyful and LOTS to learn. We're getting closer every day, it's a lot of work and a lot of happiness. You should meet her.
now.houseText: Still lots of fun. Inside is great, everything is sort of setup. Outside is even better in the summer. I'm spending most of my time outside of work outside and look at plants. I've planted lots of vegetables and a ton of nice flowers, hoping for the best. It's fun and I'm very curious how things will develop
now.workText: Also new changes here: I've taken a new position, though I'm not gonna say where yet. I'm really looking forward to it, the culture and the people sound amazing and I hope to learn quite a bit there. Oh yeah, money is also great. However, leaving the old position wasn't easy. I met a lot of great people there, which I'll miss quite a bit.
now.restText: Those were the major things. There's still a ton of things beside that, here's a list: I still like my coffee. I started drinking more tea and cocoa, too. I found a paradise cafe near me, which inspired me quite a bit. I walk now more than ever before, feels good. Still work out, still cook, although mostly simple foods. I listen to a lot of audio books, enjoy the quiet, read philosophical books with a friend and pet my cats. I'm also still learning French.
now.nowInfo: This is a 'now'-Seite, where you'll find what keeps me busy at the moment. Inspired by:
now.end: C'est tout. If you want to know more, call me or send me a message!
furtherQuestions.text: Do you have any questions, feedback or just want to talk?
